name: Santa Clause 3, The - The Escape Clause [GBA]
description:
Insects Fishing With Santa - Clause

Cast your candy hook deep and reel back as many insects as you can eat. Then slice candies right out of the sky for gold. But watch out for explosives...

*OVER 30 VARIETIES OF CANDY
* EXPLOSIVE CANDY CANES THAT STEAL YOUR CANDY
* THE DEEPER YOU GET THE BIGGER THE PRIZE
*CHECKOUT THE UNDERWATER CAMERA
* GET THE BIGGEST CATCH
* ENDLESS ENTERTAINMENT WITH CRAZY, ADORABLE, WITTY, HUMOROUS AND LOVEABLE ANIMATION.
